message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.IR

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - This paper deals with natural language processing and specifically focuses on emotion detection in textual conversations. 
2. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The proposed model, Knowledge-Enriched Transformer, is a deep learning model that uses self-attention and external knowledge to detect emotions in conversations, which falls under the domain of AI. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The model proposed in this paper is a machine learning model that uses hierarchical self-attention and external knowledge to improve emotion detection performance. 
4. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The applications of emotion detection in social networks are mentioned in the abstract, indicating that this paper may fall under the domain of social and information networks. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The task of emotion detection in textual conversations can be seen as a form of information retrieval, where the goal is to extract relevant information (emotions) from a large corpus of text.
